trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具 (Visual Designer) 中，為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 控制項提供設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is used as a container for other controls, especially when controls are generated programmatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制會當做容器使用其他控制項，尤其是當控制項透過程式設計方式產生。

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is parsed, and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記來源描述相關聯的程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>剖析控制項時，並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>類別提供設計階段支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>視覺化設計工具中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property gets the caption that appears on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>屬性取得出現在相關聯的標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property gets the styles of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A>屬性會取得針對關聯控制項的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>以產生設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法準備設計工具，以檢視、 編輯和設計關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method sets collection elements to the string representations of various style attributes of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A>方法會將集合元素設定針對關聯控制項的各種不同的樣式屬性的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>外觀和行為的控制項衍生自類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyPanelContainer` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例衍生`MyPanelContainer`類別從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyPanelContainerDesigner` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class and applies a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> attribute for the `MyPanelContainerDesigner` on the `MyPanelContainer` class.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也衍生`MyPanelContainerDesigner`類別從<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>類別，並套用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>屬性`MyPanelContainerDesigner`上`MyPanelContainer`類別。

trans-unit.source: The `MyPanelContainerDesigner` overrides the following <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> members:
trans-unit.target: `MyPanelContainerDesigner`覆寫下列<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>成員：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property to define a design-time border style for the `MyPanelContainer` control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A>屬性來定義的設計階段框線樣式`MyPanelContainer`控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property to provide a default caption for the `MyPanelContainer` control, if none was defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>屬性提供的預設標題`MyPanelContainer`控制，如果未定義。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method to throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception, if the associated control is not a `MyPanelContainer` object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>例外狀況，如果相關聯的控制項不是`MyPanelContainer`物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>類別時，它會建立相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項或一份視覺化設計工具介面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A collection of style attributes implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> 的樣式屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds string representations of style attributes to a collection to be used in the design-time rendering of the control.
trans-unit.target: 加入樣式屬性的字串表示至集合中，以便用在控制項的設計階段呈現中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> base method, which adds string representations of style attributes to the `styleAttributes` collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>基底方法，這會將樣式屬性的字串表示法`styleAttributes`集合。

trans-unit.source: These attributes are based on the style properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性會根據相關聯的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> sets the direction of `styleAttribute` to a code indicating left-to-right or right-to-left, based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A>設定的方向`styleAttribute`表示左到右或從右至左的代碼，以根據值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A>針對關聯控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption that appears on the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 控制項上顯示的標題。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the panel caption.
trans-unit.target: 包含面板標題的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.GroupingText%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.GroupingText%2A>屬性相關聯的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>繼承自一個類別中的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>在設計階段的類別。

trans-unit.source: The example provides a default caption for the associated control, if none was defined.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例將提供的預設標題相關聯的控制項，如果未定義。

trans-unit.source: Gets the styles of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 控制項的樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that contains the design-time styles for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件，包含關聯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 控制項的設計階段樣式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property is an empty string (""), the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property returns an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>屬性為空字串 ("")，則<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A>屬性會傳回空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property returns a default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that is generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.FrameStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> base property.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A>屬性會傳回預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件所產生的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.FrameStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>基底屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A>繼承自一個類別中的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>在設計階段的類別。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a design-time border style for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會定義相關聯控制項的設計階段框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />, which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />，實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法準備好要用來呈現的設計工具時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A>和其基底的方法設定屬性和設定事件所需的設計工具的作業。

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: `component`參數是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>與這個設計工具或一份相關聯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class to change the behavior of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> class at design time.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A>繼承自一個類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>類別，以變更衍生自控制項的行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>在設計階段的類別。

trans-unit.source: The example throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception, if the associated control is not a `MyPanelContainer` object.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>例外狀況，如果相關聯的控制項不是`MyPanelContainer`物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> or of a class derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 或屬於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> 的衍生類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出設計工具是否應該使用暫存複本，而非與設計工具關聯的實際控制項，來產生設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性一律會是`true`，設計工具會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>包含一份相關聯的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制項以產生設計階段標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控制項不會影響任何持續性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性覆寫以傳回`false`，設計師會使用相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>本身以產生設計階段標記，以及控制項的設計階段變更將會保存在網頁標記原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to return <see langword="false" /> or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl" />屬性，以傳回<see langword="false" />或要判定其是否有類別層級標示控制項為基礎的值<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> is not overridden, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" /> control ignores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl" />未覆寫，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel" />控制項會忽略<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />屬性。
